description: EPA Legionella Project Data Path Configuration - Desktop (NISTTeleworkSys)

AIO2.description: AIO 2 Sonic Weather Sensor - 10m MET Tower
notes: Data collected using AIO 2 Sonic Weather Sensor.
Sensor installed on a 10m MET Tower.

instrument_name.notes: Additional notes about the instrument or data

notes: 1. Copy this file to 'data_config.json' in the repository root
2. Replace PATH_TO_YOUR_PROJECT_DATA_ROOT with your actual data directory
3. For Windows paths, use forward slashes (/) or double backslashes (\)
- Update instrument names and paths as needed
- Specify file patterns for each instrument
- Add or remove sections as necessary for the project
